pipeline-scan-projects.name: Pipeline2DetailedReport
pipeline-scan-projects.description: translate Veracode Pipeline Scan results into DetailedReport XML format, allowing you to import them into an IDE plugin for remediation.

pipeline-scan-projects.name: pipeline2html
pipeline-scan-projects.description: run a Veracode Pipeline Scan and generate a human-readable .HTML file from the Veracode pipeline verification results.json file.

pipeline-scan-projects.name: veracode-pipeline-PR-comment
pipeline-scan-projects.description: Sends output of Pipeline Scan to a comment on a pull request.

pipeline-scan-projects.name: veracode-pipeline-with-baseline
pipeline-scan-projects.description: GitHub Action to perform a Veracode Pipeline Scan and, optionally, compare the results against a set of baseline results.
